== What is AVBOT? ==
*AVBOT* is an anti-vandalism bot for MediaWiki wikis. It is developed by [https://sites.google.com/site/emijrp/ emijrp] in [http://www.python.org Python], using [http://pywikipediabot.sourceforge.net pywikipediabot] and [http://python-irclib.sourceforge.net irclib].

It has been working in [http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usuario:AVBOT Spanish Wikipedia] from 2008, and it has several clones managed by other users.

== Features ==
  * Regular expressions using scores

== Download ==
You can download the *source code* from our [http://code.google.com/p/avbot/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk SVN repository].

== Documentation ==
In the [http://code.google.com/p/avbot/downloads/list downloads section] you can find a *manual* and other useful texts about AVBOT. There is also a *blog* at [http://avbot.blogspot.com avbot.blogspot.com].

== Contribute ==
If you want to send any *suggestion*, reach me at emijrp@gmail.com. For *bugs*, you can use the [http://code.google.com/p/avbot/issues/list issues] section.
